name: WYRM (4skins)
description:
A roguelike game made for Heritage Game Jam 2022

-

You play as WYRM, a parasite capable of controlling hosts it attaches to.

As a parasite, you need to attach to hosts to survive, otherwise you will slowly die.

RENEW your health by hijacking victims and stealing their life while using their abilities.

Have fun exploring the facility!

L E A V E   N O   O N E   A L I V E

-

Team members:

Gwen - Artist, Designer https://sg.linkedin.com/in/gwendelyn-fong-7840b4212

Shernice - Artist, Designer https://itch.io/profile/gehsi

Derrick - Programmer, Designer https://derpyfood.itch.io/

Kangfu - Programmer, Designer https://frizuo.itch.io/

Everybody - Project Manager ;)

-

1. How is this game relevant to the theme? (Renewal)

You play as a parasite that needs to renew it's life by attaching to hosts.

2. What sort of experience/message are you hoping your game will bring across to the player?

We are all parasites.

3. Why did you end up choosing the direction of  your game?

Heritage hard :(

-
